ps2.9:5.2: saddhābalaṃ, vīriyabalaṃ, satibalaṃ, samādhibalaṃ, paññābalaṃ, hiribalaṃ, ottappabalaṃ, paṭisaṅkhānabalaṃ, bhāvanābalaṃ, anavajjabalaṃ, saṅgahabalaṃ, khantibalaṃ, paññattibalaṃ, nijjhattibalaṃ, issariyabalaṃ, adhiṭṭhānabalaṃ, samathabalaṃ, vipassanābalaṃ, dasa sekhabalāni, dasa asekhabalāni, dasa khīṇāsavabalāni, dasa iddhibalāni, dasa tathāgatabalāni”.
ps2.9:6.4: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, kilesānaṃ pariyādānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ.
ps2.9:7.4: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, kilesānaṃ pariyādānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, paṭivedhādivisodhanaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, cittassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, cittassa vodānaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, visesādhigamaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, uttaripaṭivedhaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, saccābhisamayaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ.
ps2.9:8.4: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena satibalaṃ … pe … nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena satibalaṃ.
ps2.9:9.4: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena samādhibalaṃ … pe … nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena samādhibalaṃ.
ps2.9:10.4: Sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanaṭṭhena paññābalaṃ … pe … nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakaṭṭhena paññābalaṃ.
ps2.9:14.17: bhāvanābalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetīti—
ps2.9:15.2: Kāmacchandassa pahīnattā nekkhamme natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.4: Byāpādassa pahīnattā abyāpāde natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.6: Thinamiddhassa pahīnattā ālokasaññāya natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.8: Uddhaccassa pahīnattā avikkhepe natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.10: Vicikicchāya pahīnattā dhammavavatthāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.12: Avijjāya pahīnattā ñāṇe natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.14: Aratiyā pahīnattā pāmojje natthi kiñci vajjanti anavajjabalaṃ.
ps2.9:15.15: Nīvaraṇānaṃ pahīnattā paṭhamajjhāne natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:15.16: anavajjabalaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā arahattamagge natthi kiñci vajjanti—
ps2.9:16.7: saṅgahabalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti—
ps2.9:17.17: khantibalaṃ … pe … sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā arahattamaggo khamatīti—
ps2.9:18.7: paññattibalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ paññāpetīti—
ps2.9:19.7: nijjhattibalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ nijjhāpetīti—
ps2.9:20.2: Kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto nekkhammavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—
ps2.9:20.4: Byāpādaṃ pajahanto abyāpādavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—
ps2.9:20.6: Thinamiddhaṃ pajahanto ālokasaññāvasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—
ps2.9:20.7: issariyabalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ vasaṃ vattetīti—
ps2.9:21.7: adhiṭṭhānabalaṃ … pe … sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti—
ps2.9:22.2: Nekkhammavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, abyāpādavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, ālokasaññāvasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ … pe … paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ, paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṃ.
ps2.9:23.10: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya na kampatīti—
ps2.9:23.18: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—
ps2.9:24.4: paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, rūpe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, rūpe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ … pe … rūpe paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ,
ps2.9:24.11: cakkhusmiṃ … pe … jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ, jarāmaraṇe dukkhānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ … pe …
ps2.9:24.31: Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—
ps2.9:26.2: Idha khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:26.3: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe saṅkhārā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—
ps2.9:27.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
ps2.9:27.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—
ps2.9:28.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāraṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ nekkhammābhirataṃ byantībhūtaṃ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi.
ps2.9:28.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti vivekapoṇaṃ vivekapabbhāraṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ nekkhammābhirataṃ byantībhūtaṃ sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—
ps2.9:29.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā.
ps2.9:29.2: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—
ps2.9:30.1: Puna caparaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā … pe …
ps2.9:30.6: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā honti subhāvitā … pe …
ps2.9:30.8: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito.
ps2.9:30.9: Yampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito hoti subhāvito, idampi khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno balaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma khīṇāsavo bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānāti—
ps2.9:31.2: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammā payogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi—
ps2.9:32.2: Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:32.3: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. #1
ps2.9:33.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:33.2: Yampi tathāgato atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ, nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. #2
ps2.9:34.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:34.2: Yampi tathāgato sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti. #3
ps2.9:35.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:35.2: Yampi tathāgato anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa … pe …. #4
ps2.9:36.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:36.2: Yampi tathāgato sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa … pe …. #5
ps2.9:37.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:37.2: Yampi tathāgato parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa … pe …. #6
ps2.9:38.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ps2.9:38.2: Yampi tathāgato jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, idampi tathāgatassa … pe …. #7
ps2.9:39.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
ps2.9:39.2: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo … pe … iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
ps2.9:40.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne … pe …
ps2.9:40.3: yampi tathāgato dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne … pe …
ps2.9:41.1: Puna caparaṃ tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
ps2.9:41.2: Yampi tathāgato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ hoti, yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti.
